description_text:
Hello, i ordered a set of pedals on thursday night i even paid 23€ for fast
shipping 3-7 days you claimed, but still its tuesday now and you havent
even packed it yet, when will it get shipped?

conversations.body_text:
I dont know why it used this email for support, the email i used when
ordering is jorzutv@gmail.com

Den tis 6 jan. 2026 08.44support@simsonn.com
Hi Para,   Please provide your order number, and we will help check and confirm the issue.

Hi Para,     We apologize for the delayed response. Your package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive around the 15th. Below is your tracking link:  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510414675712/trackdetails
